thread.title: 15 NFL Cheerleaders You Need to Follow On Instagram
thread.title_full: 15 NFL Cheerleaders You Need to Follow On Instagram

author: Barry K
title: 15 NFL Cheerleaders You Need to Follow On Instagram
text:
15 NFL Cheerleaders You Need to Follow On Instagram Meet the fittest women on the field every Sunday By Dan Roe January 13, 2017 Instagram/nicolemanelas,allisond26,camillekostek 
It’s crunch time for the eight remaining teams in the NFL playoffs, and coaches are making every effort to ensure their players are in impeccable shape to win the Super Bowl. Same goes for the cheerleaders, who are also tasked with staying fit and maintaining morale regardless of whether their team is up by 3 touchdowns or down 20 points with 5 minutes left in the fourth quarter. If you think NFL cheerleading is just about flashing a peppy smile, wearing a short skirt, and waving around pom-poms, think again: These women can probably outlift and outrun the average Joe and casual gym bro. 
Suffice it to say that these hard-working women don’t get enough credit for the training they put in. For starters, some work other jobs during the season. Plus, you try crushing a HIIT workout without ruining your eyeliner. That’s why we’re showcasing some of the strongest, sexiest NFL cheerleaders in the game. Because as every NFL post-game interview states, the victory is a total team effort. 
Let’s appreciate these strong, sexy women while the playoffs last. Because come baseball season, you’ll have nothing to look at but a bunch of sweaty guys adjusting their hats and spitting tobacco.
